org.eclipse.jetty.start

Class BaseHome

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jetty.start.BaseHome

  • public class BaseHome
extends Object
    File access for ${jetty.home}, ${jetty.base}, directories.

    By default, both ${jetty.home} and ${jetty.base} are the same directory, but they can point at different directories.

    The ${jetty.home} directory is where the main Jetty binaries and default configuration is housed.

    The ${jetty.base} directory is where the execution specific configuration and webapps are obtained from.

        Create a file reference to some content in "${jetty.base}"
        Parameters:
        path - the path to reference
        Returns:
        the file reference

      • getFile

        public File getFile(String path)
        Get a specific file reference.

        File references go through 3 possibly scenarios.

        1. If exists relative to ${jetty.base}, return that reference
        2. If exists relative to ${jetty.home}, return that reference
        3. Otherwise return absolute path reference
        Parameters:
        path - the path to get.
        Returns:
        the file reference.

      • listFiles

        public List<File> listFiles(String relPathToDirectory)
        Get all of the files that are in a specific relative directory.

        If the same found path exists in both ${jetty.base} and ${jetty.home}, then the one in ${jetty.base} is returned (it overrides the one in ${jetty.home})

        Parameters:
        relPathToDirectory - the relative path to the directory
        Returns:
        the list of files found.

      • listFiles

        public List<File> listFiles(String relPathToDirectory,
                   FileFilter filter)
        Get all of the files that are in a specific relative directory, with applied FileFilter

        If the same found path exists in both ${jetty.base} and ${jetty.home}, then the one in ${jetty.base} is returned (it overrides the one in ${jetty.home})

        Parameters:
        relPathToDirectory - the relative path to the directory
        filter - the filter to use
        Returns:
        the list of files found.

      • listFilesRegex

        public List<File> listFilesRegex(String regex)
        Get all of the files that are in a specific relative directory, with applied regex.

        If the same found path exists in both ${jetty.base} and ${jetty.home}, then the one in ${jetty.base} is returned (it overrides the one in ${jetty.home})

        All regex paths are assumed to be in unix notation (use of "/" to separate paths, as "\" is used to escape in regex)

        Parameters:
        regex - the regex to use to match against the found files.
        Returns:
        the list of files found.

      • rawListFiles

        public List<File> rawListFiles(String relPathToDirectory,
                      FileFilter filter)
        Collect the list of files in both ${jetty.base} and ${jetty.home}, even if the same file shows up in both places.
